hello.c

#include <stdio.h>
#include "max.h"
#include "min.h"

int main()
{
	int a1 = 5;
	int a2 = 10;
	int maxnum = max(a1,a2);
	int minnum = min(a1,a2);
	printf("æœ€å¤§æ•°å­—æ˜¯ï¼š%d\n",maxnum);
	printf("æœ€å°æ•°å­—æ˜¯ï¼š%d\n",minnum);
	return 0;
}

max.c

int max (int a, int b)
{
	if(a>b){
		return a;
	}else{
		return b;
	}
}

min.c

int min (int a, int b)
{
	if(a>b){
		return a;
	}else{
		return b;
	}
}
